resources.string: AIESEC in Delhi IIT, a Delhi based Local Committee is situated in the capital city of India whose rich heritage and culture leaves one mesmerized. In Persian, delordili(Delhi) means heart. It means that Delhi belongs to the large-hearted/daring people. It is an amalgamation of rich heritage and post modern culture and offers much more than you can ever imagine.
Office Address: A-226, Shivalik Colony, Malviya Nagar, near Gol Chakkar, New Delhi, Delhi-110017
